feed.title: PodFetch Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PodFetch: Version 4.6.0
entry.content:
New features

API keys

If you are using basic or oidc auth, you need to run podfetch users generate apiKey after upgrading to this release. This generates API keys. That way every audio file/image and stream with the backend is secured by an apiKey that is unique to your own user account.

What's Changed

  • Remove/podcast history items by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/456
  • Fixed linting. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/457
  • Bump openssl from 0.10.59 to 0.10.60 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/458
  • Bump sysinfo from 0.29.10 to 0.29.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/459
  • Bump serde from 1.0.192 to 1.0.193 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/461
  • Bump uuid from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/460
  • Bump @types/react-dom from 18.2.16 to 18.2.17 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/462
  • Bump react-router-dom from 6.19.0 to 6.20.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/463
  • Bump postcss from 8.4.31 to 8.4.32 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/466
  • Bump utoipa-swagger-ui from 4.0.0 to 5.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/472
  • Bump jsonwebtoken from 9.1.0 to 9.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/471
  • Bump react-router-dom from 6.20.0 to 6.20.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/470
  • Bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.4.2 to 6.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/469

  • Bump vite from 5.0.2 to 5.0.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/467
  • Bump zustand from 4.4.6 to 4.4.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/483
  • Bump csstype from 3.1.2 to 3.1.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/482
  • Bump tokio from 1.34.0 to 1.35.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/478

  • Bump typescript from 5.3.2 to 5.3.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/479
  • Bump chart.js from 4.4.0 to 4.4.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/481
  • Bump @fontsource-variable/inter from 5.0.15 to 5.0.16 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/480
  • Bump @types/react-dom from 18.2.17 to 18.2.18 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/489
  • Bump material-symbols from 0.14.1 to 0.14.3 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/488

  • Bump @types/react from 18.2.41 to 18.2.45 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/502
  • Bump tailwindcss from 3.3.6 to 3.4.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/501
  • Bump react-router-dom from 6.21.0 to 6.21.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/498

  • Bump actix-web from 4.4.0 to 4.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/496
  • Bump awc from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/497
  • Bump vite from 5.0.5 to 5.0.10 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/499
  • Bump react-i18next from 13.5.0 to 14.0.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/500
  • Improve/var replacement by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/504
  • 503 rss feeds exposed by default by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/506

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/compare/v4.5.0...v4.6.0

entry.title: New release for PodFetch: 4.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added postgres client to windows. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/507
  • Bump sass from 1.69.5 to 1.69.6 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/510
  • Bump framer-motion from 10.16.5 to 10.16.16 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/511
  • Bump thiserror from 1.0.52 to 1.0.53 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/519
  • Bump id3 from 1.10.0 to 1.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/517
  • Bump frankenstein from 0.29.1 to 0.29.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/516
  • Bump serde_json from 1.0.108 to 1.0.109 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/515
  • Bump react-hook-form from 7.48.2 to 7.49.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/513
  • Bump @types/react from 18.2.45 to 18.2.46 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/514
  • Bump i18next from 23.7.6 to 23.7.13 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/512
  • Bump sysinfo from 0.29.11 to 0.30.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/518
  • Fixed build. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/521
  • Add api key to OPML export. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/522
  • Fixed date containing T and other date fixtures. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/527
  • Add api key by default to user. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/528
  • Return error if the currently created user is equal to the admin user. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/529
  • Fixed podcast episode not containing podcast image. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/530
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.2 to 1.15.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/538
  • Bump @types/react from 18.2.46 to 18.2.47 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/537
  • Bump vite from 5.0.10 to 5.0.11 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/536

  • Bump serial_test from 2.0.0 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/532
  • Fixed rss feed urls when no image is given. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/541
  • Added reverse proxy auth. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/543
  • Bump react-router-dom from 6.21.1 to 6.21.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/553
  • Bump react-icons from 4.12.0 to 5.0.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/552
  • Bump framer-motion from 10.16.16 to 10.18.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/551

  • Bump material-symbols from 0.14.3 to 0.14.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/549
  • Bump utoipa from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/548
  • Bump rss from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/547
  • Bump base64 from 0.21.5 to 0.21.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/546

  • Bump uuid from 1.6.1 to 1.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/569

  • Bump autoprefixer from 10.4.16 to 10.4.17 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/563
  • Bump i18next from 23.7.16 to 23.7.18 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/562
  • Fixed missing translation key. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/573
  • Bump chrono from 0.4.31 to 0.4.33 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/574

  • Bump regex from 1.10.2 to 1.10.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/578
  • Bump env_logger from 0.11.0 to 0.11.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/577

entry.title: New release for PodFetch: 4.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added more meaningful exception message when trying to create an api … by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/587
  • Added pwa support for PodFetch. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/589
  • Fixed notification not showing correctly. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/591
  • Bump material-symbols from 0.14.6 to 0.14.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/592
  • Bump tokio from 1.35.1 to 1.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/599
  • Bump actix-web-actors from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/598
  • Bump awc from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/597
  • Bump @types/uuid from 9.0.7 to 9.0.8 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/596
  • Bump react-router-dom from 6.21.3 to 6.22.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/595
  • Bump i18next from 23.7.18 to 23.8.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/594

  • Bump regex from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/676
  • Bump jsonwebtoken from 9.2.0 to 9.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/675

entry.title: New release for PodFetch: Version 4.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed
